+ 3 others§r

§72003§r

Comments: \u00a77\u00a7o24 pages, 19 figures. Version 3 includes several improvements thanks to referees, including formal definitions of simple folds, more figures, table summarizing results, new open problems, and additional references\u00a7r

§6§lFast Verification of Convexity of Piecewise-linear Surfaces§r

§8§oKonstantin Rybnikov§r

§72003§r

Comments: \u00a77\u00a7o10 pages (abbreviated version). Significantly different from all olderversions. Discount the previous version \u2013 it had many omissions and typos, like the following one: everything works starting from dimensionn=3, not n=2
as was printed in the oldabstract. Hyperbolic and spherical cases have been substantially rewritten and errors fixed. This preprint is close to a similar preprint on the MATH part of arxiv.org\u00a7r
